title: Channel Islands National Park: Activities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Activities               Activities       The islands not only offer a delightful break from the congestion and clamor of urban life, but also numerous activities--hiking, camping, snorkeling, kayaking, birdwatching, photography, or just relaxing to the soothing sounds of the natural world. Please click on the links below to learn about activities within the park. Visit the park's Visitor Services List for a complete list of authorized concessioners and commercial service operators who can help facilitate your outdoor activities within the park.  Â            Interpretive Programs            Hiking            Camping                  Backcountry Camping            Picnicking            Boating                  Kayaking            Diving            Snorkeling                  Fishing            Surfing            Tidepooling                  Whale Watching            Seal and Sea Lion Viewing            Bird Watching                  Wildflower Viewing            Channel Islands Live            From Shore to Sea Lectures
